title: WIFELY BLUES: The Lonely Lady
description: Cecilia Burns was the beauty who loved all the games that she played. Until her whirlwind romance with the handsome Carlton Winters swept her off her feet and into his world of extravagance and opulence. They had it all until she began to wonder where he was. And finally she began to wonder if she had to find herself or him.
author: Alvin Slater
